title: Global Cloudflare Crash: Check Your Traffic
content:
âš Be careful! Today there was a global outage at Cloudflare, which affects most services, platforms, and websites. So, please check carefully if your traffic is working correctly and if users are being routed properly to the offer.

We recommend temporarily pausing traffic to be on the safe side, and resuming as soon as the issue is fixed.

Our teamâ€™s CRM system is down, so weâ€™re waiting for a fixðŸ”§.

title: We are updating the usage policy for our training materials and platform access.
content:
Under the new rules, access is granted for a fixed period:

Mentorship Package 3 months from the start of your training
Knowledge Base Package 6 months from the start of your training

This time is more than enough to go through the material, build a solid understanding, and start working with the system.
After this period, your access will not be hard closed. If you wish, you can extend it on very friendly terms

49 EUR per month
or 199 EUR for 6 months

We are constantly improving the product updating lessons, expanding the Road Map, and adapting content to changes in Meta and the iGaming market. By extending your access, you automatically receive all future platform updates.

For Mentorship participants whose initial 3 months have already passed, we are reserving access until February 25. After that date, you will need to either extend your access or cancel it.
